entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
